alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 14 at 10:28AM EST until February 14 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Critical relative humidity, breezy northerly winds, and high ERC values will result in elevated fire danger today... .High pressure building in is supplying very dry air on breezy north winds today. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR... low humidity, gusty winds, and high ERC values... The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Area - Ruskin FL has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect until 5 PM EST this afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Coastal Lee...Inland Lee. * WIND...Northerly winds 15 to 20 mph and gusty. * HUMIDITY...around 25 percent. * ERC...36. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
